lines.text: Hm... Flesh to Stone backfires if the target has a <c=#FF00FF>status effect...</c>
I bet the effect of Mass Arrest Momentum would count as a status effect, right? ''Stunned'' or ''Frozen'' or something like that?
...Sure? How should I know what does and doesn't count as a status effect?
Isn't that your job, to know about how magic works?
Well, sure, but that doesn't mean I know every single status effect in the game.
...And, speaking of knowing how magic works... I doubt the Stop Wizard wouldn't know how his own magic worked.
If Mass Arrest Momentum did count as a status effect, there's no way he'd cast Flesh to Stone while it was active.
He'd dispel it or wait for it to wear off, first.
If it backfired because of a status effect, it <c=#FF00FF>wouldn't be one of his own spells.</c>
